alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Gosper; Greeley; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Phelps; Polk; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 02 at 3:25PM CST until January 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Ice accumulations of two tenths to four tenths of an inch. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Patchy blowing snow on Tuesday could reduce visibility as well. The hazardous conditions are expected to impact travel this evening through Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This is a tricky forecast where a degree of temperature change could impact icing amounts significantly. Similar...if colder air moves in, snow amounts would increase while icing amounts would decrease especially for northwestern portions of the area.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
